mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mount Vernon Mansion, west front from the bowling green entrance
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Detroit Publishing Co.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white horizontal image of the Mansion's west front from the bowling green gate. Detroit Publishing Co.'s rights statement appears on the reverse.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mansion exterior
